attributes.action: Award John Bercow with a life peerage (to the House Of Lords)
attributes.additional_details: Award John Bercow with a life peerage (to the House Of Lords) in the event the Government decide not to follow with tradition and automatically award John Bercow (the outgoing speaker) a life peerage.
attributes.background: Award John Bercow with a life peerage (to the House Of Lords) in the event the Government decide not to follow with tradition and automatically award John Bercow (the outgoing speaker) a life peerage.
